website_summaries.verdict: Protected storage for both bottles and glasses. Good for use as a side cabinet.
pros: Variety of drawers and smaller cabinets to fit everything you need for casual wine use
cons: Piece is wider than other cabinets

customer_reviews.title: Very nice once you put it together
customer_reviews.text: Very nice once you put it together, wich in my case, It took me (hours). Too many pieces of (particle board), and lots of screws in many sizes, after a while I felt overwelmed. It's a bit flimsy once you put it together, I reinforced it with metal brackets in each corner, I really recommend doing that. Note: it doesn't come with lights, I did that on my own, so after all the ordeal, it looks nice and elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Rick E.

customer_reviews.title: This bar was Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This bar was Perfect for my needs! I love everything about it! The color is dark the wood is sturdy and is the perfect size. It did take a long time to put together by myself about 2 1/2 hours but it completely doable. The only thing I do not like is the flimsy back piece. I would eventually like to replace it with a more sturdy piece of wood. I also would love another shelf as an option to have two on one side and one on the other. It is definitely worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Ok - damage control needed
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit. As others have said received with scratches and have to use the touch up pen included a bit. Also on mine on the right side rear edge all the fake wood was peeling lose. Had to glue it and still needs some work.
customer_reviews.author: Dave in Rancho Cordova

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with mine. of course do plan to spend a few hours putting it together. but I found that the parts were well labeled, packaged in a well organized way, and needed very few tools to assemble. The instructions were easy to follow. the only thing that bothered me was that the door and roll-out drawer took a little messing with before I got them to sit right. other than that I love it. I bought some inexpensive motion sensor light and mounted them on the inside, so they turn on when ever I open a door or drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, holds everything you need for a small home ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, holds everything you need for a small home bar. I have received several compliments on it. Don't try to put this thing together while drunk or you WILL miss some steps.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother, junk from Mexico
customer_reviews.text: Junk, cheap looking. I had several wrong pieces, veneer is cracked in multiple places. This unit took an extremely long time to build. This is what I get for buying online. I requested replacement pieces. Update: replacement parts came a month later and from Canada. The quality is a world apart, so much better from Canada then Mexico. This will end up as a donation or trash. If you can get it from Canada and are OK with many hours of assembly then go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Edward G

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing, but a chore to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This bar is convenient in terms of storage it allows and it does look nice from an aesthetic perspective, however it is nearly impossible to line up the doors so that you don't see the obvious blemishes in terms of how the parts don't really align perfectly. The instructions are also tedious to decipher and with the amount of small parts this is a headache to put together. The larger pull out drawer also does not come to a complete close when pushed in as it goes to soft close and then lingers and needs to be pushed in a second time. Product also came with nicks and chips that is typically associated with particle board based furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cracked pieces, not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I chose to give this product a chance after reading the reviews about cracked pieces but wish I hadn’t. Sure enough as soon as I opened the package i had a piece with a HUGE crack along the width of it. Called to get it replaced and it’s 2-5 days for them to manufacture the part, not counting the packaging and shipping. Really inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Historynerd

customer_reviews.title: Took a while to assemble.. alignment distorted after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Edit: After six months of use the alignment of the cabinet is completely distorted and it doesn't look good. We tried all settings but the cabinet is bent (view pics for reference). Was perfect when we first assembled but now after six months of use it is all bent. We did not put any extreme weight in the cabinet. Just a few bottles and some glasses that's all. The bar cabinet is meant to be used like that. Awesome bar cabinet!! Took us around 3 hours to assemble but looks great, a must buy if you want a bar cabinet in a small space I only wish it had wheels to move it around my apartment
customer_reviews.author: Harshi & Abi

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I do love this piece. It did take my husband about 6 hrs to assemble on his own. There were also about 5 very noticeable nicks/scratches. I contemplated sending the pieces back but we found a furniture nick kit that covered them right up.  My husband also moved the towel rack to the other side pretty easily. The bottom left drawer does not close flush on its own--it needs a push to complete shut it. Tons of storage though and I love the wine glass part!
customer_reviews.author: MomWithAnAmazonProblem

customer_reviews.title: Chipped and missing parts
customer_reviews.text: It took forever to put together by a professional. Many pieces were missing, so we had to make shift many parts of this. Also, the cabinet would not close, so we had to buy a magnet to ensure it would be sealed shut. There were at least 5 chips in this, as well, thank goodness it came with a sharpie. What a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Dukoff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a microwave cart with storage because I have a very small kitchen. This cabinet has so much more space than I had imagined! The right side of it has two shelves and an area to hang wine glasses. I keep my smaller glasses underneath on the top shelf, where the wine glasses are hanging above them. The bottom shelf has plenty of room! I keep my crock pot there. The left side has a pull out drawer and a shelf. I keep some cake pans on the shelf and my blender in the drawer. Perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Megs84

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble, but love the end result
customer_reviews.text: Hardest thing in the world to put together. Genuinely took us HOURS. However, finished product is beautiful. Really happy with it. But really was NOT prepared with how hard it was to set up. Guess that is expected though when you need to have furniture shipped. We had a few issues with getting it together along the way, but we figured it out. We now LOVE this piece for our dining room!
customer_reviews.author: Devon Ervin

customer_reviews.title: Great bar cabinet for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a versatile cabinet to fit the small bar space I have in my townhouse. This was perfect. I managed to assemble it working solo in an afternoon (<3 hours, with breaks). Instructions were very easy to follow, and I have no complaints about the total time spent due to ease and price I paid. If you grew up building legos like me, it can even be a fun project. The pieces were in overall good condition. There were some small blemishes in areas on the chipwood. Unfortunately two of these were on the top piece. Other than that, I'm satisfied with the durability and quality of materials.
customer_reviews.author: Grayson Walker

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy it again
customer_reviews.text: This table was a nightmare to put together and I could never get the drawers to go in properly, but it’s got great storage
customer_reviews.author: Krazyflake

customer_reviews.title: Love this cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. My loves it. My first package arrived with a damaged part. I contacted the manufacturer and they responded very fast. The sent me a new part and all was good. There are a lot of parts and the aligning the doors can be a bit of a challenge. But with a little patience, it all works out. This thing looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Mullis

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This item is ok. First of all, it's a huge pain to put together, which I read in previous reviews. One piece came severely damaged (pic 1). Customer service was super nice and sent a new piece right away. I hadn't noticed that another piece was damaged as well (pic 2). I needed the whole thing assembled quickly at that point, so I guess I will just deal with it. The drawer does not close easily. If you push it shut it doesn't close without an extra push (pic 3). I don't hate it, but I would love it more without all the flaws. It does look nice from afar.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Kuyper

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, tons of assembly, bad hardware, not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t purchase a product like this from Walmart because I wanted something a little more durable and sturdy. Upon arrival, two pieces of the very cheap wood material was already damaged. It’s not sturdy and definitely not worth the price. If you want something of Walmart quality, save your money and get something similar from there. At least then you’ll get what you paid for. Also, note that the wine racks are held up by flimsy plastic tabs that allow the shelves to move and wobble.
customer_reviews.author: Collins Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great looking piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking piece of furniture, even more so considering the price. The instructions were simple to understand with page by page listings of what pieces you would need to complete each step. With a break for dinner it took about 4 - 4.5 hours for us to assemble. All the drawers move smoothly and the swinging door sits nice and even. The construction seems sturdy as well. Would like to also note that they did a great job with packaging this item. Not a single board was nicked or scratched and it space was used efficiently. Would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Otaku Azucar

customer_reviews.title: FLIMSY
customer_reviews.text: Cannot give enough negative comments about this product. Instructions extremely difficult to understand; made from particle board; one piece had holes on wrong side. Returned to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Ferriol

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was fairly easy (with 2 people), however the instructions were very vague. If you don't do well with photos and prefer written instructions, this could pose as a problem. Luckily my husband prefers photos so he was able to decipher better than I could. Sturdy build and love that you can customize the shelving. I even added an extra wine glass rack so it can hang 5 rows of wine glasses. I've received many compliments on my wine bar!!
customer_reviews.author: RMKohl16

customer_reviews.title: I want to love it
customer_reviews.text: Im so disappointed. I've had this item on my wish list for 2 years & finally bought it when i found the perfect space for it. The large drawer will not align at all. I have taken it apart multiple times to no avail & it just won't close. Telephone customer service was fantastic & sent me replacement parts, which sadly never worked. Don't waste your time emailing customer service as they never respond. I'm torn between just calling it a loss & trashing it, or struggling to get the heavy (almost 100lbs) down the stairs & out to a ups to get my $ back
customer_reviews.author: Naneki

customer_reviews.title: As Described
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as described and price was cheeper then brand website. One issue drawer glides for bottom drawer are wonky and don’t glide easily , but we are working to adjust / modify so drawer will open and close easier. Suggestion for nails, screws etc . would be that manufacture label bags. It is nice that wood pieces are marked on raw edge so you don’t have to waste time picking of stickers .
customer_reviews.author: MDR & JAR

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but doesn't function perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Overall, for the price it's a nice looking cabinet and it will do a basic job for occasional use, however it took probably 4 hours total time to put together for one person. I could not for the life of me with all of the adjustment attempts get the large drawer to sit flush with the rest of the cabinet. The packaging was also torn and beat up upon delivery, but the instructions were pretty straight forward and the assembly parts were well organized. It would be nice if more adjustment suggestions or assembly tips were included in the directions to avoid having to troubleshoot later.
customer_reviews.author: Cmk

customer_reviews.title: Made of cheap particle board.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the effort. It is made of very cheap particle board. Extremely heavy due to all the glue and hard to build. Some corners come already scratched. Large drawer cannot hold the weight of bottles and will hardly open. Do not purchase this item, you will be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: na

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: If you want to spend 3 hours putting it together, this is for you! I would compare it to something that I’ve gotten from Walmart to our together. The wood used for the pieces isn’t the best quality. If I were to go back I wouldn’t buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I received this a day ago took no time for my son to put it together , I'm happy with the results it looks good in my living room and matches the furniture. There's also alot of space which is what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Cnickiqpon

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to a room.
customer_reviews.text: I am not handy at all and this was pretty simple to put together. I put it together by myself and it looks great! It did take a few hours but I had time. The directions were clear and easy to read. It’s spacious and the perfect size for the space I wanted it to put it. I’m satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Eriekab

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Had way too much trouble getting this delivered. Would not recommend. Too much trouble
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but a lot to put together
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted a bar so I bought this one. He loved it but he said it was a million pieces. It just was a lot to put together. The cabinet has some chips in the wood but they send touch up paint. If I had a complaint it would definitely be the Little chips of wood that are missing I feel it shouldn’t have any for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Quite pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was very glad that this item arrived timely since so many of the reviews talked about it taking forever to arrive; that was not our case. It was also not as difficult to put together as we thought it might be, though it did take several hours since there are so many pieces. None of the pieces were missing and all of the parts were in good shape. It is also much sturdier than I thought it would be, given the reviews. We were overall quite happy with this product! And I love the color!
customer_reviews.author: Pefy Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Time consuming and very heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely was worth the price and everything! Been wanting to make a coffee bar station. We got it super early, and decided to set it up after dinner. Definitely need 2 people, very heavy.. and setting it up took us about 3-4hrs.. but was worth it. Looks beautiful but would’ve started setting up earlier if we knew it would take that long. We messed up on putting the wine shelves and the black is facing down.. so our bad... other than our mistake, everything is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Susi Kuczka

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic piece of furniture and excellent customer service. Looks beautiful and offers a TON of storage. Amazing value for the price. It arrived with a dent in one of the pieces. I sent them a picture and they processed the claim and sent a new piece very quickly. At this price point what more could you ask for?!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Gratop

customer_reviews.title: Looks like picture directions suck
customer_reviews.text: There are screw tap hole missing everywhere for attaching trim and the wine glass holder. Large drawer doesn't fit great. Directions are a bit difficult to interpret. it does look like the picture though. If you are an intermediate furniture assembler you can do it. Takes about 90 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Everything fit and the instructions were great if you paid attention
customer_reviews.text: Why stickers on the outside?? It was a beast to put together but thats expected. Everything fit and the instructions were great if you paid attention. Pretty cabinet with a lot of storage. 4 stars b/c 3 of the pieces had stickers on them on the side that shows once it's all put together. They are STICKY stickers too. thats a pain.
customer_reviews.author: JBrown1107

customer_reviews.title: Alright product, delivered poorly
customer_reviews.text: As others have said most of the problems come from the delivery and packaging. I was shipped damaged parts and missing some others, and to ship replacement parts to me takes a while. Also a difficult assembly with poor instructions. I’m unsure how the cabinet is given that I don’t have the parts necessary yet but it seems fairly sturdy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kading

customer_reviews.title: Good bar cabinet  for the price
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. It doesn't open and close perfectly smooth, but it's also fairly strudy so far. It is really heavy. I couldn't have carried the boxes it came in into the house on my own. We've been using it a few months now, and it's an attractive, well-sized bar cabinet for our space. It takes a few hours to build and I strongly recommend having someone help.
customer_reviews.author: lilpuppup

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Arrived a week earlier. Product quality is great. Very sturdy. Minor issues I encountered: on piece had a slight scratch but was fixed with marker included. Lastly, 2 screws weren’t included. We had to work around missing 144 screws. Overall, my husband and I love it. It’s quite beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Wife picked this out to keep our alcohol in it works out great a lot of storage and very well made not cheap and flimsy like most very easy to assemble. And most of all it holds a lot of alcohol
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: A solid bar with plenty of storage!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece, and as some have mentioned I think they've improved the packaging because it arrived in great condition. I did opt to use a different wine glass rack than the one included because it didn't fit my glasses with larger stems. After some research I found this product which gave me a third row of glasses and fit great:
customer_reviews.author: N. Sanghvi

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: I bought this. Excitedly opened it up and one critical piece was missing any holes drilled at all (should have been lots) and another piece had them drilled so off center that the thing would have fallen apart if I could have gotten it together. This was the worst thing I've ever bought at Amazon. Looks good on the photo - worthless....
customer_reviews.author: Mtn.Sam

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: a HUGE pain to assemble but so beautiful and sturdy. super happy with this and it holds a ton from all our liquor and glasses to extra items like bitters and mixers and growlers. great storage bar, really pretty. we have gotten a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: hannah westphall

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Even though it was a pain to put together the end result is great. We bought this to put in our media room. We put our popcorn machine on top and put the booze, candy and popcorn accessories (the essentials lol) in the other compartments. Its nice that we have everything easy access so we don't have to stop our movie.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony & Tory

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: I think it's a great addition to my living room. I love it. I didn't have to assemble it, but the person who did took their time and it turned out well
customer_reviews.author: ButtaflyPoet

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to assemble if you have a fair amount ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to assemble if you have a fair amount of experience with this type of furniture. Took around 2 hours though. The layout of the cabinet is great and there is plenty of room for everything you would need. I wish it didn't have such a strong particle board smell though.
customer_reviews.author: averagejoe

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This storage far exceeded my expectations! The quality is outstanding and once assembled, it is very study. And it looks great. This was my first furniture piece purchased on Amazon and I am glad I decided to take a chance.
customer_reviews.author: P.G.

customer_reviews.title: Cool addition to my dining area.
customer_reviews.text: 4 star overall. But... BUY IT ANYWAY!! 3 hours assembly time. A few parts were damaged in shipping, BUT... great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Bascom O St.Romain

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bar, not as easy to assemble as it looks.
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece of furniture despite the fact that it’s incredibly heavy and took quite a while to assemble by myself (I recommend having someone help you). The final product is sturdy and looks great. My only gripe about it is the back panel and the fact that they don’t provide you enough nails to secure it in a nice and efficient way. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Crystalia

customer_reviews.title: Bar can’t hold bottles.....
customer_reviews.text: This held up for about a year but has started to buckle under the weight of bottles.... it’s sold as a bar but I wouldn’t put too much in it if you want it to last....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good shape
customer_reviews.text: When the box arrived it looked in pretty bad shape, but to my surprise the contents was unscathed. So great job to the packaging department, it’s really heavy and bulky for one person. It was easy but time consuming which was just fine for me seeing how ALL the parts were there so overall very happy with its product.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Junk !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worst think I bought ever!!! All scratch... doesn’t even worth 10 dólares!!! Still waiting for a response from the company to find a solution!!! Complete piece of junk
customer_reviews.author: Marco Salgado

customer_reviews.title: Quality cabinet that exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: This bar cabinet exceeded my expectations. The cabinet comes with quality hardware and door slides. We fully stocked it with bottles and the door slides perform great. The finish of the wood is also consistent and didn't have any dings or dents in it. Although it did take nearly 2 hours to assemble, the instructions were adequate and easy to follow. This cabinet is an excellent value for the price and we have already recommended it to several friends.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea N.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good as the pictures.
customer_reviews.text: Not a huge fan but it works. It’s missing pieces and the directions were not the easiest to understand. The photos look better on here but in person it looks cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Don Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this bar cabinet. The only issue I have with it is that the large slide out drawer does not line up right and it shows. I tried to fix it and adjust the hardware, but no matter what I did, I just couldn't get it to sit right. I would recommend this product if it was a bit more sturdy and the parts all lined up the way they should.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this,looks really nice in my kitchen,wheels have a lock on it to stay in place,love the side shelfs...little bit to pricey but I'm very happy with it..I recommend it you wont be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Susi

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Worth the Money with one criticism
customer_reviews.text: Very cute item for our kitchen - it holds all of our alcohol and alcoholic paraphernalia. Only criticism is that the sliding big drawer catches a bit and doesn’t seem to go back into place easily. It also took a bit to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality bar cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with the packaging. Nothing was damaged and small items in separate packs. Impressive storage for bottles and glasses, even a drawer for bar implements.
customer_reviews.author: Handyandy

customer_reviews.title: The way it looks.
customer_reviews.text: This looks great. It took my friend 2 hrs and 45 minutes to put together by himself. I just love the storage in it. It looks beautiful in my apartment. ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Debra S. Zaiff

customer_reviews.title: Like a puzzle that takes a day to complete
customer_reviews.text: If you like IKEA quality this is for you. The Chinese lamenite partical board and instructions are the same as you get with IKEA furniture. Putting this together will take the better part of your day. Getting the door and large drawer was very difficult.
customer_reviews.author: John N Robertson

customer_reviews.title: You should take your time because it does take like 3 or 4  hours to build
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was very fast👌 .. but the furniture is not a good quality, It comes with a few dents in the size..! I wanna return the door but he was gonna take a long time so I just rather paint a little bit in the bottom with the same color ..The package doesn’t come that well protect I think that’s the reason why it comes so many Dent on the furniture..!! Overall the furniture is nice.! but I will not purchase again .!
customer_reviews.author: Luis angel

customer_reviews.title: Just The Right Size
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Not too large and not to small for holding the right amount of bottles and wine glasses. The instructions for putting it together could have been written better, but it is very functional. I really like the hideaway pull out drawers and storage. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Keith J. Groves

customer_reviews.title: Missing a piece
customer_reviews.text: I like this product so much, it’s perfect for my bottles. The only problem i had its that the box came all damage but luckily nothing inside got damage. The only bad thing is that it’s missing a part. The bottom board of the shelve on the top left one. If it only came completely.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry11991

customer_reviews.title: No quality control in the factory, missing pieces and drilled holes
customer_reviews.text: Missing lots of pieces and not all the holes are drilled. You don't find out until you unpack everything and have a 30 pieces spread out!!!! :(
customer_reviews.author: greg b.

customer_reviews.title: solid but watch for damaged pieces upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Very solid product. Assembly is a above average difficulty but if you've done an ikea product you can do it. Product was shipped with two damaged pieces (not damages from shipping travels). looks very nice though.
customer_reviews.author: TMH

customer_reviews.title: Good but poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: While Product is easy to assemble and works well. It came wit multiple chips on the pieces and some damage. The UPS driver Did drop it but the damage was on different panels on different locations. Irrelevant to the drop.
customer_reviews.author: Jared J.

customer_reviews.title: A nice cabinet
customer_reviews.text: It did come in , and I had to put it together. I do enjoy those kinds of projects so I didn't mind. But after all that was done, its a great piece in my home.
customer_reviews.author: da785968

customer_reviews.title: Damaged When Received
customer_reviews.text: The product was received in a tattered box (should not have been shipped) and was found to be damaged in a very prominent location upon partial assembly. It is not practical to repackage and return a product of this weight and complexity so will just have to live with it. DISAPPOINTING to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Poor assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: The assembly instructions were very poor. Could not figure out how to assemble. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking-horrible instructions
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking product. The instructions were not clear at all. Ended up having to drill some of our own holes. But after we got it put together, it is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classy Feel
customer_reviews.text: This item really creates a classy feel in my home and it is great for entertaining. I have so much glassware in this and able to have drinks in it. Great thing to have.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley V.

customer_reviews.title: Great for small or large housing.
customer_reviews.text: I like color as it blends with my cabinets and the storage that it provides. The bar space on the top allows me and my guests to have enough room to prepare drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: It Will Take You 3 Hours to Build
customer_reviews.text: Just like all the other reviews it will take a while to build. It looks nice when done but there were some product defects - the front left door came with a scratch and the right door stripes were over painted. I didn’t call customer service because I wanted to get it done and I will try and cover the scratches with gray pen. Left drawer is hard to balance but again looks pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Guy

customer_reviews.title: Bar Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet after full installation is very good. Each and every detail for installation was provided in the manual. It took me approx. 4 hours to put together everything.
customer_reviews.author: PRAKS

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: This product has the poor instructions and if you want to spend 2 hours fighting to get the lower left hand cabinet aligned to where it will actually close feel free to purchase this product. If you call their help line you will repeatedly hear perfect but not actually help you
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply built is an understatement. If your looking for ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply built is an understatement. If your looking for anything more than a Walmart furniture look then your wasting your time with this piece. Also came with many dents and scrapes. Might work in a dim, very dim basement to hold a couple decorations. Certainly not built for regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha Dunlevy

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Hard to assemble items are not labeled clearly. Takes two people. Directions are not clear. Customer Service not very helpful. If you could buy assembled do that instead.
customer_reviews.author: Xaviera Pouncy

customer_reviews.title: damaged shipping; cumbersome assembly
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with the cabinet design and looks, however the assembly was a bit cumbersome and more importantly it was pretty damaged on delivery. Several dents and chips were still visible after assembly. Luckily a pen was included to try to hide most of the damage, but the dents and broken corners cannot be hidden.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great storage & attractive, too!
customer_reviews.text: This bar is set-up well for entertaining. It is attractive and reasonably easy to put together, although you should expect to invest 3 to 4 hours of your time. I am very pleased with this bar!
customer_reviews.author: Juanita

customer_reviews.title: Nice home bar
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were a little difficult to follow for me. Overall great piece with plenty of storage options and utilizations. Nothing feels overly cheap so I feel this was a great buy. I was able to fit 8 wine glasses in the racks under the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie H.

customer_reviews.title: I put two stick-up LED lights inside and love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had a friend assemble this for me. Took him about an hour. It is very roomy and holds everything I need. I put two stick-up LED lights inside and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Denise M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: It was fairly difficult to assemble, definitely harder than something from IKEA, but not impossible either. That being said I'm quite happy with how it turned out. It looks very nice in the room and is quite sturdy. The drawers/shelves aren't perfectly aligned (although they can be adjusted somehow) but overall for the price point I'm quite happy with the product. Provides a lot more storage and space to work with than a bar cart.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Can be a nightmare to assemble definitely a 2+ hours ...
customer_reviews.text: Can be a nightmare to assemble definitely a 2+ hours worth by yourself. My only complaint, which isnt the bars fault but if your floor isn't level the larger drawer may slide out on its own if filled.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Peppers

customer_reviews.title: Pictures look better than product
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this cabinet—it fit perfectly in the entryway of our apartment. Unfortunately when it arrived, it had several dents/dings. Also when we put it together there were obvious gaps between the cabinet door and the drawer. Overall, it was a disappointment, and I felt like the pictures looked nicer than the actual product, especially considering the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Collins

customer_reviews.title: not pleased with product
customer_reviews.text: not pleased with product. bottom drawer will not go all the way in and there were chips right across the center of the product. Box was in tact....so not sure how this happened.
customer_reviews.author: Donna J Beckett

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Piece
customer_reviews.text: I would buy from this furniture company again. I’m pretty great at putting furniture together, their manual is a bit complicated, but all of the pieces have letters to assist.
customer_reviews.author: Gabsv

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Product wasnt the easiest to put together but it is beautiful my complaint is the door to store the glasses dosent close all the way but other than that for the price no other complaints
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product for the price but was a little hard to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Carmella lucero

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you and your spouse have a strong bond
customer_reviews.text: Once built, it is nice. The instructions are very vague. If you are building this with your spouse, I hope you have a strong relationship... It will be tested. Have a few glasses of bourbon or wine before the build to ease the tension. Also, ensure that you have eaten a ml before hand to avoid hanger.... Something will be upside down... it will be frustrating. Keep your eyes on the prize. It’s cool when it’s done.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Vissia

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Cabinet arrived 2 days ahead of anticipated date and was packaged very well - no damage on the pieces at all. It did take two of us several hours to assemble, diagrams in the instruction manual were basically good, but a bit confusing at times. A bit more written guidance would provide clarity and be a good idea. Overall it is exactly what I expected and I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: fh

customer_reviews.title: sturdy but also a little unfuctional
customer_reviews.text: We have had this item for about a month now. We use it for all of our alcohol. The drawers aren't as easy to slide in and out but love the wine rack and definitely love the amount of space you have to put all sorts of items within it. We always like the look of keeping everything presentable and the dryer wood on this definitely allows for the presentation to our home.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Top shelf arrived damaged, but sturdy bar nonetheless
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love this because its sturdy and pretty but the top shelf arrived damaged. Theres no way im going to return or replace this item so I went ahead and built it anyway. I did it myself, instructions were clear and it took me about 5 hours.
customer_reviews.author: nyankitteh

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Was super excited to get this and it like all the other reviews, it is a pain to assemble it. What I noticed is that all the wood was warped causing gaps between the shelves and cabinets. Overall it looks nice from a distance, but when spending that much money for a piece of furniture, I expect it to be better quality. I'm pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Haze

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Looks good . The drawer could be more stable . Was alittle disappointed in rhe damaged piece that in the front of the unit. The damaged piece had to be done from the factory on how it was packaged very well . No touch up marker as others had stated . Overall still happy with it
customer_reviews.author: daniel tucker

customer_reviews.title: for the price it is pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as advertised. Wood is not high quality but it does the job. The liquor draw cannot handle too much weight so you have to be careful but it does an ok job. for the price it is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t give 5 stars to the assemble category because the bag for the bolts didn’t have numbers or letters to identify them, also some of the boards didn’t have letters. Otherwise it is exactly what we need it and the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: carolina

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay. The back wall and drawer bottom are super thin. It could be a little “tighter” too. All in all it’ll serve it’s purpose.
customer_reviews.author: GatorGearz

customer_reviews.title: Missing some scews and drawer channel
customer_reviews.text: The back of the unit is "thin wood sheet" and not strong at all. Its too flimsy. It is also not the correct size and leaves a visible gap from the sides or open area which is tacky. Should be better back. I have not received the correct channels for thr drawers. Can the seller contact me to resolve this
customer_reviews.author: CARL

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant and we get a lot of compliments from friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful little cabinet/bar. We like the look and it matches our dining table very well! Had the box damaged on shipment and got the replacement parts in a week! The customer service is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Perdue

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The product had a lot of issues. It came with a wrong colored piece, the cabinet door doesn’t close fully and will need to be shaved down, and it came chipped. Once the door is fixed it’ll look very nice, it just wasn’t worth the cost or time it took putting together.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

product_meta.title: South Shore Vietti Microwave Cart on Wheels, Black Oak
product_meta.description: Color:Black Oak| Size:CartA multifunctional piece for a small kitchen need more room in your compact kitchen? This cart will meet your storage needs and add another surface for meal prep or your microwave. We’ve set up spaces for your table essentials: adjustable shelves for dishes, a drawer for tablecloths and accessories, Shallow shelves with a rim – for keeping spice jars, oil or wine bottles secure – and even a towel rack. This piece was designed to use every inch of space! Ideal for your microwave the top surface is just the right size for your microwave and the extension hidden underneath makes your work easier, by giving you an extra surface where you can put down your dish. We know food spills happen all the time, so we covered The two top surfaces – of this cart and the pull-out extension – in a thin, water resistant film. Be careful if your plate is hot – We suggest you use a mat or trivets to avoid damaging the cart. Wheel mounted This compact cart is finished All around, so you can shift it as needed and show any side – no worries. Just unlock the two brakes on the wheels and move it wherever you like. When applied, they keep the cart locked in place. 5-Year limited South Shore is proud to stand behind this microwave cart on wheels with shelves and drawer with an exclusive 5-year limited. Shop with confidence knowing your purchase is always covered. All our products meets or exceeds North American safety standards and our packaging are tested and certified to reduce the risk of damage during shipment. This item is shipped in 1 box, make sure to have a friend with you. Assembly is required by 2 adults and tools are not included. If you have questions regarding this product or need assistance do not hesitate to Contact South Shore furniture 7 days support. This product is made in North America with laminated particleboard. Accessories not included.
feature_bullets: Water resistant top surface: the thin film covering the top of this cart makes it water resistant.
A kitchen piece on wheels: The wheels make this cart easy to move, and the two brakes Lock it in place…. so you can shift it hassle free from your kitchen to the dining room.

Versatile storage: this piece, which is great for tight spaces, is a storage solution for all sorts of items: spices, Oils, wine bottles, accessories, dishes, etc. Each shelf can hold up to 25 lbs. Use the cart to hold your microwave… or create an extra work surface!

5-Year limited: South Shore is proud to stand behind this microwave cart on wheels with shelves and drawer with an exclusive 5-year limited. Shop with confidence knowing your purchase is always covered.

Easy assembly instructions: all products come with a clear assembly document that will guide you through all steps. If you have any questions during the assembly do not hesitate to contact South Shore Furniture for immediate support. This item is shipped in 1 box, make sure to have a friend with you

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars585 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
